name: Marcus Chen
motivation: Protect Elena and expose corporate corruption
ambition: Bring down corporate systems that destroy lives
concrete_goal: Help Elena recover memories safely and publish the expose
conflict: Idealistic belief in Elena goodness clashes with evidence of violence
epiphany: Loyalty means standing by someone even when you see their darkness
arc: From naive idealist to mature advocate

physical_description.distinctive_features: Wears old-fashioned glasses, ink stains on fingers

mannerisms.speech: Fast-talker when excited, quotes revolutionary literature
mannerisms.habits: Takes notes on everything, compulsive fact-checker
mannerisms.tics: Adjusts glasses when nervous, drums fingers when thinking
